document.full_text: a long night came to a happy conclusion for the mets in a game that became a backdrop for the nation's reaction to the news of the death of osama bin laden.
document.title: mets 2, phillies 1 (14 innings): mets win on field in 14 innings, but big news was buzzing in the crowd
lines_and_colors: a long night came to a happy conclusion for the mets in a game that became a backdrop for the nation's reaction to the news of the death of osama bin laden.
